name: The Cube (itch) (Ramon Matas, xBeernii)
description:
The Cube is a puzzle game made by two artists currently studying at the University of Barcelona. 

You control a cube that has to find six missing faces of another cube, so he can break his solitude. 

WASD To move the cube and Left Click + Drag to move the camera.

Hope you like the project, it's still in development, any suggestion or help is welcome <3.

Made by: Ramon Lluís Matas & Martí Barnils
